metric_template.description:
Select metric to display in the chart. the last value in an interval of 10 minutes is selected by default. Availables template values are
  • connector
  • connector_name
  • component
  • resource
  • metric
e.g. {{component}} - {{metric}}
metric_template.title: metric template

series.description: Select computed metric values usable in the texteditor. When many points selected for the serie interval, the last one's value only is displayed.
